snippet: Liverpool, looking to rebound from a dramatic 4-3 defeat at Bournemouth last weekend, face West Ham United, who are just above the relegation zone and licking their wounds following a 5-1 thrashing by Arsenal, on Sunday....
lead_paragraph: Liverpool, looking to rebound from a dramatic 4-3 defeat at Bournemouth last weekend, face West Ham United, who are just above the relegation zone and licking their wounds following a 5-1 thrashing by Arsenal, on Sunday.

snippet: Manchester United are warming to the task in the Europa League as they booked a spot in the last 32 with a 2-0 win over Zorya Luhansk on a freezing night in Ukraine on Thursday....

headline.main: Mkhitaryan Sparkles as United Reach Europa Last 32
headline.print_headline: Mkhitaryan Sparkles as United Reach Europa Last 32

lead_paragraph: Manchester United are warming to the task in the Europa League as they booked a spot in the last 32 with a 2-0 win over Zorya Luhansk on a freezing night in Ukraine on Thursday.

snippet: - Burnley scored twice in the space of three first-half minutes to end a run of three straight defeats with a 3-2 home win against Bournemouth on Saturday in the first Premier League meeting between the sides....

headline.main: Burnley Beat Bournemouth 3-2 After Quick-Fire Double
headline.print_headline: Burnley Beat Bournemouth 3-2 After Quick-Fire Double

lead_paragraph: - Burnley scored twice in the space of three first-half minutes to end a run of three straight defeats with a 3-2 home win against Bournemouth on Saturday in the first Premier League meeting between the sides.

snippet: Mamadou Sakho faces an uncertain future at Liverpool after the defender was sent back to England from the Premier League club's pre-season tour of America....

headline.main: Sakho's Liverpool Future in Doubt After Being Sent Home
headline.print_headline: Sakho's Liverpool Future in Doubt After Being Sent Home

lead_paragraph: Mamadou Sakho faces an uncertain future at Liverpool after the defender was sent back to England from the Premier League club's pre-season tour of America.

snippet: Left back Nathan Ake has joined Bournemouth on a season-long loan from Chelsea, the Premier League clubs have announced....

headline.main: Bournemouth Sign Defender Ake on Loan From Chelsea
headline.print_headline: Bournemouth Sign Defender Ake on Loan From Chelsea

lead_paragraph: Left back Nathan Ake has joined Bournemouth on a season-long loan from Chelsea, the Premier League clubs have announced.

snippet: Leicester City striker Jamie Vardy will miss the Premier League leaders' visit to Manchester United on Sunday after being banned for an additional game for improper conduct, the BBC reported....

headline.main: Leicester's Vardy Gets Additional One-Game Ban
headline.print_headline: Leicester's Vardy Gets Additional One-Game Ban

lead_paragraph: Leicester City striker Jamie Vardy will miss the Premier League leaders' visit to Manchester United on Sunday after being banned for an additional game for improper conduct, the BBC reported.

snippet: Leicester City striker Jamie Vardy has accepted a Football Association improper conduct charge following his red card in Sunday's 2-2 draw with West Ham United....
lead_paragraph: Leicester City striker Jamie Vardy has accepted a Football Association improper conduct charge following his red card in Sunday's 2-2 draw with West Ham United.

snippet: Sunderland goalkeeper Vito Mannone has urged supporters to back the team with "one last push" as they seek to avoid relegation from the Premier League....

headline.print_headline: Sunderland's Mannone Urges Fans to Back Final Push in Relegation Battle

lead_paragraph: Sunderland goalkeeper Vito Mannone has urged supporters to back the team with "one last push" as they seek to avoid relegation from the Premier League.

snippet: Southampton midfielder Gaston Ramirez has joined second-tier Middlesbrough on loan for the rest of the season, the Premier League club said on their website (www.saintsfc.co.uk) on Tuesday....

snippet: Swansea City must improve at both ends of the pitch to have any hope of avoiding relegation, manager Bob Bradley said on Thursday....

headline.main: Bradley Wants Struggling Swansea to Improve in Both Boxes
headline.print_headline: Bradley Wants Struggling Swansea to Improve in Both Boxes

lead_paragraph: Swansea City must improve at both ends of the pitch to have any hope of avoiding relegation, manager Bob Bradley said on Thursday.
